body:
Before 2024, our Central Block (CB) only had 4 floors!
It got an upgrade recently — more space, more hustle!

Every student knows the real meaning of 
FFCS during registration:
👉 Frequently Fails, Causes Stress 😅💥
Because the only thing “flexible” here is your patience.
footer: For legal reasons… that’s a joke. 😉

body:
Your college email ID isn’t just for assignments 
it’s your “deal-lightful” pass to discounts! 🎟️
From jamming on Spotify to snagging gadgets on Samsung,
being a student really pays off! 😎

You actually have a better chance of finding a partner
than connecting to the campus Wi-Fi…
footer: But let’s be real — you’re not getting either. 💔📵

body:
The water coolers on campus have two modes:
“broken” and “warm water surprise.” 💧🔥

Mess food menu is basically a mystery novel 
full of plot twists your stomach never expects. 🍛😬

The only time the VTOP servers work perfectly
is when you don’t need them. 💻🙃
footer: But hey, Better VTOP isn’t like that — we actually work when you need us! 🚀

body:
The Wi-Fi is so slow,
by the time your page loads, the syllabus might change. 📶📜

The only math every student does seriously is 
“How many classes can I bunk and still survive?” 🧮🤔

You can predict your attendance like the stock market 
volatile, risky, and mostly going down. 📊📉

The fastest runners on campus are students
chasing attendance in the last week. 🏃💨

Assignments are just proof that Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V
still work flawlessly. ⌨️😂

The fastest way to fill an auditorium?
Just announce “OD will be given.” 📋😂

Your ID card photo will haunt you
for the rest of your degree. 🎟️📸
The Wi-Fi works best when you finally give up on using it. 📶🙃

Every semester, you promise yourself you won’t procrastinate 
and then you do it professionally. ⏳😏

The only lab experiment that always fails
is trying to print something on time. 🖨️💥

Group projects teach you two things:
teamwork… and that you’ll end up doing all the work alone. 🤝📄

Exam seating is carefully designed
to place you as far as possible from your smartest friend. ✏️🪑

The fastest thing on campus is the
“last 24 hours before assignment submission.” 🏃💨⌛

Every club meeting starts with “This will be short,”
and ends 2 hours later. 🕑😅

The Wi-Fi has only two modes:
“Doesn’t connect” and “Too slow to matter.” 📶🐢

There are two types of students 
those who care about attendance, and those who ask “bro proxy pettava?” 🗣️📋

The campus printers and FFCS servers are in a constant competition
to see who can crash more. 🖨️💥💻

Exam results are like horror movies 
you know they’re coming, but you’re never ready. 📄😱

Assignments are 90% Google,
10% formatting to make it “look original.” 🔍📄

Every semester starts with you as the “motivated topper” sitting in the first row…
… and ends with you as the “proxy master” calculating how many classes you can safely bunk. 🎓➡️🪑😂

Assignments teach you two valuable skills:
Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V. 🖱️⌨️

The servers crash faster than your hopes
during FFCS registration. 💥💻

Hostel Wi-Fi works best at 3 AM 
perfect timing for procrastinators. 📶🌙

The loudest sound in hostels?
The fire alarm at 2 AM when you’re finally asleep. 🔔💤

The hostel mess food teaches you the true value
of Swiggy and Maggi. 🍜📱

Hostel lifts are so slow,
you’ll reach your floor faster by climbing stairs. 🪜😂

The fastest Wi-Fi on campus
is the hotspot of your friend with unlimited data. 📶📱

Late-night Maggi tastes 10× better
when you’re supposed to be studying. 🍜⏳

The mess samosas have a secret recipe 
99% air, 1% potato. 🥔😂

Group projects are proof that one person’s blood, sweat, and tears
can still get an “A” for everyone. 🧑‍💻📄

The fan in your hostel room has seen more deep life conversations
than any therapist. 💭🌀

The less you attend classes,
the faster your professors start recognizing you. 👀📋

Every assignment is basically a group treasure hunt
for the perfect Google Doc to copy from. 🔍📄

The person who reminds the teacher about homework submissions
is the true campus villain. 🦹‍♂️📋

Exam question papers have a superpower 
they always include that one topic you skipped. 📄😅

Hostel Wi-Fi speed and exam tension
are inversely proportional. 📶📉📚📈

There’s always one classmate who says
“Is syllabus coming for exam?” one day before finals. 🤯📄

FFCS day has two types of people 
those who pray and those who cry. 🙏😭

The mess calls it “tea,”
but your tongue calls it hot colored water. ☕😂

The only subject students study deeply is
“how to give proxy without getting caught.” 🎓🗣️

Assignments are just a group activity of
copy, paste, and pray. ⌨️🙏

The fastest runners on campus are students
rushing to mark attendance in the last 5 minutes. 🏃💨

The day you decide to attend class,
the professor will be absent. 📋🚫
Our future…
